oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Foot officer's sword belonging to Captain N.M. Bearden.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This foot officer's sword is engraved with the name "Captain N.M Bearden" of Company E, 8th Tennessee Infantry Regiment, CSA. It appears to be imported from London with a German made blade which is acid etched. The closed basket hilt includes an eagle motif on the guard. The scabbard has been nickel-plated.
